name: nxttool-starter
description: Nxttool Starter mit Tailwind und Alpine.js
author: schwarzdesign

scripts.copy:js:dev: copyfiles -f src/js/alpine.min.js public/assets/js/ && copyfiles -f src/js/dark-mode.js public/assets/js/ && copyfiles -f src/js/page-nav.js public/assets/js/
scripts.copy:js:prod: copyfiles -f src/js/alpine.min.js public/assets/js/ && copyfiles -f src/js/dark-mode.js public/assets/js/ && copyfiles -f src/js/page-nav.js public/assets/js/
scripts.build: npm run copy:js:prod && npx tailwindcss -i src/css/tailwind.css -o public/assets/css/styles.css -m
scripts.watch: npm run copy:js:dev && npx tailwindcss -i src/css/tailwind.css -o public/assets/css/styles.css -w
